SEARCH
Package server

Klasse Server

java.lang.Object
server.Server
public class Server extends Object
The Server class represents a server application. It handles incoming client connections, manages message passing to ServerThreads and shared resources between ServerThread and Game classes.

      Creates unique Server instance.

      Passes message to all connected and registered clients.

      Passes message to specified client.

    • sendMessageToAllActivePlayers

      public void sendMessageToAllActivePlayers(String message)
      Passes message to all active players.

    • sendMessageToAllActivePlayersExceptOne

      public void sendMessageToAllActivePlayersExceptOne(ServerThread excluded, String message)
      Passes message to all active player except for one.
      Parameter:
      excluded - Excluded player.

    • sendMessageToNotActivePlayers

      public void sendMessageToNotActivePlayers(String message)
      Passes message to all registered but not playing clients.

    • sendPersonalMessage

      public void sendPersonalMessage(ServerThread from, String message)
      Passes message to one client by its ServerThread if its name was entered correctly.
      Parameter:
      from - This is the ServerThread sending a passing message request.

    • increaseActivePlayerCount

      public boolean increaseActivePlayerCount(ServerThread client)
      Increases the count of active players if its maximum is still not reached.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the procedure was completed successfully.

    • decreaseActivePlayerCount

      public boolean decreaseActivePlayerCount(ServerThread client)
      Decreases the count of active players with restrictions.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the procedure was completed successfully.

    • modifyActivePlayerList

      public void modifyActivePlayerList(ArrayList<ServerThread> list)
      Replaces the entries of the list of active players with the entries of a given list.

    • gameOver

      public void gameOver()
      Performs clean-up tasks and notifies all connected clients about the end of the game after a specified ending condition is met.

    • joinGame

      public void joinGame(ServerThread serverThread)
      Handles a join game request sent by a client. This method processes the request, manages the conditions for a client to join the game and notifies other players about the new player joining if the conditions are met.

    • starGame

      public void starGame(ServerThread serverThread)
      Handles a start game request sent by a client. If the conditions to start a game are met, this method calls the createGame method and starts the first round. It also notifies all clients about the start of a new game.

    • exitGame

      public void exitGame(ServerThread serverThread)
      Handles an exit game request sent by a client. If the conditions to exit the game are met, this method decreases the number of active players and if the number is lower than 2 ends the game. It also notifies all clients about player exiting the game.
